name: Bearly Fed
description:
This game is a tribute to old arcade games as well as to the days of playing games together with your best friend, using the same keyboard.

I personally find it quite amusing to play solo with both bears active. You should give that a try, too^^

Originally started on a "let's get better at programming" whim, this little project turned out to be entertaining enough for me to eventually finish and upload it!

I hope my little game provides you some fun as well - looking forward to see your screen filling highscores :D
